```r
"append_archive: no visible binding for global variable 'text'
  extract_firstline: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  extract_highlight: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  extract_html_text: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  file_name_raw: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  get_output: no visible global function definition for 'mutate'
  get_output: no visible binding for global variable 'X1'
  get_output: no visible binding for global variable 'X2'
  get_output: no visible binding for global variable 'get_title'
  get_output: no visible binding for global variable 'text'
  get_selection: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  get_url: no visible global function definition for 'map_chr'
  m1: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  m2: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  m3: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  m_detail: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  paste_kindle: no visible binding for global variable '.'
  select_lines: no visible binding for global variable '.'" %>% 
    read_lines() %>% 
    str_remove_all("^\\s+") %>% 
    str_extract("global variable .+") %>% 
    str_remove("global variable ") %>% 
    unique() %>% 
    na.omit() %>% 
    str_flatten(", ") %>% 
    clipr::write_clip()
```

```r
globalVariables(c('text', '.', 'X1', 'X2', 'get_title'))
```
